name: Ice Slide
description:
Slide to reach the finish line in this simple, mobile-friendly, kinetic puzzle game inspired by Pokemon's fiendish gym puzzles. All in less than 2048 bytes!

Play through ten levels and try to reach the finish in as few moves as possible. Make sure to avoid the pits!

Best played on http://dhmstark.co.uk/games/2kplus/ice-slide/
